job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for multiple excellent software engineers to join our team You are a good fit if p pyou love to get handson and solve any problem on the way to building our first product which p pcan include obtaining and cleaning data training ML models putting models into production p pfrontend and backend development and more You have an enthusiastic attitude and you p pknow how to combine scrappiness with discipline and quality ppbr ppResponsibilitiesnbsp ppbr p ulliCreate pointintime data repositories updated in real time or daily liliUnderstand the fixed income domain in detail and prepare data using this understanding liliTrain state of the art deep learning models using TensorFlow liliProductionize models in APIs that are easy to use by our customers liliBuild web interfaces for human consumptios liulpbr ppQualifications ppbr p ulliDegree in computer science or a related area lilinbspExcellent communication and interpersonal skills lilinbspSignificant experience as a professional software engineer lilinbspStrong interest in capital markets and in joining a startup lilinbspPreferred Experience with Python cloud computing TensorFlow and serverless lilinbspPreferred Experience building for high availability low latency and high throughput lilinbspPreferred Degree in finance or similar qualification such as CFA lilinbspPreferred Ability to grow rapidly into a manager andor into a principal engineer liul        pbr ppWhat We Offer ppbr p ulliDiverse and inclusive environment committed to equal opportunity liliExcellent salary equity health insurance 401K and other benefits liliOpportunity to work directly with founders who include a top professor of machine learning a successful serial entrepreneur and a managing director from a topranked investment bank liliRapid US visa sponsorship availableliul
